QuestData.Title: What's Mined Is Yours
QuestData.Description: Aw'right, so you need jade, do ya? I'd say we owe you at least that - we got plenty in the quarry, and thanks to yer help we should be back on schedule in no time.$B$BI should probably get back to the wife, so let's you and me take this cart o' the good stuff straight to her.$B$BNow, I ain't never met no $r t'were too big for me to pull in a wagon. You climb on the back there and let ol' Hao do the legwork.
QuestData.LogDescription: Board the jade cart and ride with Hao back to Emperor's Omen.
QuestData.RewardText: You did it! You brought my honey-bear back!$B$BOh thank you, $p! Thank you!
